author: Z.B. Steele
description:
An ambitiously deep tale of fatherly love, forgiveness, and gore, God of War is a reboot from the original trilogy that brings the series to new heights. Deep, nuanced character work, interesting Norse lore and world-building, smooth combat, and some stunningly gorgeous and epic visuals, God of War stands tall as one of Playstation’s greatest […]

The post REVIEW: God of War appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: God of War

author: Aaron Jones
description:
Why are we drawn to dark stories? Let’s take that one step further. Why are we drawn to stories that are fantastical and otherworldly? This is something that I have written about previously as grimdark shows that even the slimmest ray of hope can illuminate the darkest corners. There isn’t much darker than grief. Stories […]

The post The Power of Fantasy and Sci-fi when Dealing with Grief appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: The Power of Fantasy and Sci-fi when Dealing with Grief
